faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AIGrid

items.question: How do I get access to the tools?
items.answer: Once you complete your purchase, you'll receive immediate access to all tools through AdsPower with pre-configured profiles.

items.question: Do I need to install anything?
items.answer: No, most tools are web-based and work directly through AdsPower. We provide detailed setup guides for everything.

items.question: What kind of support do you offer?
items.answer: We provide personalized technical support through our exclusive WhatsApp group, where you can get help with any questions or issues.

items.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a longer plan at any time. We'll prorate the remaining time on your current plan.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept multiple payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, bank transfer, and cryptocurrencies for your convenience.

items.question: Do you offer any guarantee?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your purchase no questions asked.

items.question: Are the tools compatible with all devices?
items.answer: Our tools work on Windows, Mac, and Linux through AdsPower. Some tools also have mobile versions available.

items.question: How often are the tools updated?
items.answer: We constantly update our tools to include the latest features and improvements. All updates are included in your purchase at no additional cost.

items.question: Can I use the tools on multiple devices?
items.answer: Yes, you can access your tools on up to 2 devices simultaneously with your AdsPower account.
